# cloudbeaver_team (Resource)

Team resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cloudbeaver_team" "example" {
  id   = "team-id"
  name = "Project Team"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Team identifier

### Optional

- `description` (String) Team description
- `name` (String) Team name
